title: cure-patient
desc: More advanced cases in need of surgical intervention are also seen. Patients during their visit to the Dental Clinic are educated about proper oral hygiene

title: Dental Examination
desc: There are 2 parts to a regular dental visit â€“ check up, or examination and the cleaning, or oral prophylaxis. At the dental check up your dental professional will check for cavities.

title: scaling and cleaning
desc: Scaling and cleaning involves the removal of built-up debris from the teeth. This may include food particles, soft plaque (bacterial growth) or hard calculus

title: Dental fissure sealants
desc: Sealants protect teeth from decay. Any tooth that has deep grooves or fissures can be treated, but the most commonly treated teeth are the molars and premolars.
